original_text: Finally the temple guards went back to the chief priests and the Pharisees, who asked them, “Why didn’t you bring him in?”
korean_text: 아랫사람들이 대제사장들과 바리새인들에게로 오니 그들이 묻되 어찌하여 잡아오지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Finally the temple guards went back
to the chief priests and the Pharisees
Why didn't you bring him in?
